alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 9:40PM PST until January 17 at 12:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... San Diego River At Fashion Valley. For the San Diego River...including Fashion Valley...Minor flooding is occurring. The river level was at 11.0 feet at 9 PM. Flood Stage is 11.3 feet. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...The river level was at 11.0 feet at 9 PM. Flood Stage is 11.3 feet. The river will continue to recede overnight. However, low-water crossings will continue to be impacted past midnight. * WHERE...San Diego River At Fashion Valley. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.3 feet, low water crossings on the river in Mission Valley are closed and under water. Roads impacted include...Fashion Valley Road, Avenida Del Rio, Camino Del Este, Camino De La Reina, and Mission Center Road. Water flows into Fashion Valley parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 pM Monday the stage was 11.0 feet. - The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:17 AM PST Monday was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will fall overnight. - Flood stage is 11.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.5 feet on 04/10/2020. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. This will be the last statement.
